1.0.name: wordpress/pretty-login-urls
1.0.description:
This simple plugin use wordpress rewrite api to change login and register url to whatever you want. On activation by default will change wp-login.php to "/login" and wp-register.php to "/register". You can change these on the settings page.

Plugin's Official Site

Pretty Urls (http://www.masquewordpress.com)

Increase your twitter and Facebook followers

Increase your Twitter followers with Social PopUP Plugin (http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/social-popup/)
